Name: Shadow Boxer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
STRAIN into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: As the name suggests this is a punchy cocktail – spirituous and bittersweet with a long bitter finish. Far from being a crowd-pleaser.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2016 by Ivy Mix at Leyenda, New York City, USA. The original recipe calls for Dolin Dry Vermouth, Giffard Pamplemousse and Blume Apricot Eau de Vie.
Nutrition: One serving of Shadow Boxer contains 215 calories
